title: Somos del Maiz
description: "We are from Corn" is a project of Movimiento vegano activista (The Activist Vegan Movement)in Playa del Carmen. It's a store that provides vegan, organic, and ecological products. Location is inside the holistic center Palapa Suuk.
streetAddress: Calle 46 CTM entre 5ta y 10 avenida Colonia
